comments:
I ran into an NPE when running a unti test locally built using an old project.  The project's .classpath file referenced a container path that wasn't present in   the testing workbench.

From org.eclipse.jst.common.jdt.internal.classpath.ClasspathUtil:

final IClasspathContainer container;                        
try
{
  container = JavaCore.getClasspathContainer( entry.getPath(), jproj );
}
catch( JavaModelException e )
{
  Logger.getLogger().logError( e );
  continue;
}
final IClasspathEntry[] containerEntries
  = container.getClasspathEntries();


It's valid for JavaCore.getClasspathContainer() to return null without throwing a JavaModelException.
This has already been fixed in both 1.5.1 and head.
